# Time

Displays a time ensuring a consistent styling across DB products.

This component implements the guidelines of:

- https://dpp.bahn-x.de/content/german-writing/zeitangaben
- https://ux-guide.deutschebahn.com/document/148

```jsx
<Time dateTime="09:54" />
```

## Imports

```js
import { Time } from '@db-design/react';
```

```scss
@import '@db-design/styles/global';
@import '@db-design/styles/components/time';
```
